newsitem.title: GREECE: ATHENS BOURSE PLANS U.S. ROADSHOW IN OCTOBER.
newsitem.headline: ATHENS BOURSE PLANS U.S. ROADSHOW IN OCTOBER.

text.p: The Athens stock exchange will present Greece's equities market to U.S. institutional investors in Boston and New York October 22 and 23, it said.
The team of officials will include bourse president Manolis Xanthakis, the head of the capital markets commission Stavros Thomadakis and the deputy governor of the Bank of Greece.

Officials from listed companies including Alpha Credit Bank, Ergo Bank , National Bank , OTE telecom, Viohalco, Delta Dairy , Titan, 3E Hellenic Bottling, Silver & Baryte, AEGEK and Attica Enterprises will hold company presentations, it said. --George Georgiopoulos, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
